title: Texas cop busted for fake annulment & juggling 7 women. Tennessee doctor with same name says, 'THAT'S NOT ME!'
itunes:title: Texas cop busted for fake annulment & juggling 7 women. Tennessee doctor with same name says, 'THAT'S NOT ME!'
description:
A Texas police chief is on the wrong side of the law after he allegedly faked annulment papers to keep his "girlfriend" from finding out he was still married. Texas Rangers arrested Jason Collier, who is of tampering with a government document. The airing of all this dirty laundry has caused a little bit of disruption to the life of Tennessee doctor of the same name, but Dr. Jason Collier has found a way to make to use the situation for good, as he tells Nancy Grace.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
